post:
AlphaRacks Halloween VPS Sale!

alpharacks.com, los angeles October 31, 2016 @ 8:01 am, by Jon Biloh

Julian from AlphaRacks submitted an offer letting us know that his company has some exclusive packages available for Low End Box users to celebrate Halloween! Over the past few years AlphaRacks has been posted numerous times, and as recently as August 2016. The feedback in the last offer wasn’t perfect, but we do appreciate that Julian and team were very responsive to customer issues and comments. Things don’t always go perfect, but what is most important is that a company responds and resolves issues. If you signup with this exclusive Halloween offer please be sure to share your feedback.

Payment methods accepted are PayPal and credit cards via 2Checkout. The terms of service for AlphaRacks is available at https://www.alpharacks.com/terms.

In their own words:

AlphaRacks provides cost-effective VPS’s out of Los Angeles. We focus on providing a network that provides the best connectivity to Asia and worldwide. AlphaRacks is now here with some treats (no tricks!) for the LEB’ers, this Halloween season only. Order from this LEB ad and open a ticket afterwards and we will TRIPLE your bandwidth allocation AND upgrade your network port speed to 1Gbps for free. As a reminder, bandwidth resources are reset every month even on yearly plans!

Spooky VPS Special 512MB:
– 512MB RAM
– 512MB vSwap
– 1 vCPU
– 15GB Disk Space
– 2TB transfer
– 100Mbps uplink
– 1x IPv4
– 40x IPv6 (free on request)
– DDoS Protection powered by QuadraNet Vest
– OpenVZ / SolusVM
– $9.95/year
Order Link: https://www.alpharacks.com/myrack/cart.php?a=add&pid=212

Two more offers along with node and datacenter details are available, just read more.

Spooky VPS Special 2048MB:
– 2048MB RAM
– 2048MB vSwap
– 4 vCPU
– 40GB Disk Space
– 3TB transfer
– 100Mbps uplink
– 1x IPv4
– 40x IPv6 (free on request)
– DDoS Protection powered by QuadraNet Vest
– OpenVZ / SolusVM
– $19.00/year
Order Link: https://www.alpharacks.com/myrack/cart.php?a=add&pid=213

 
Frightening VPS Special – 4GB OF RAM!!!
– 4096MB RAM
– 4096MB vSwap
– 4 vCPU
– 200GB Disk Space
– 5TB transfer
– 100Mbps uplink
– 1x IPv4
– 40x IPv6 (free on request)
– DDoS Protection powered by QuadraNet Vest
– OpenVZ / SolusVM
– $10.00 per month
Order Link: https://www.alpharacks.com/myrack/cart.php?a=add&pid=214

 

Linux VPS Offers:
Linux OS Choices (32 and 64 bit): CentOS, Scientific Linux, Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, Suse

No killer clowns (though the offers you’re about to see are much more spooky and frightening than the killer clowns!), no tricks, or anything of that nature this Halloween. All treats, exclusively for the LEB community.

 

Node Details:

– 2x Intel Dual Xeon 5620 /5639’s
– 128GB RAM
– 4x 2TB HDDs
– Hardware RAID10 w/ CacheVault
– 2x 1Gbps uplink
